comments: Professor Coster was one of my best professors at Morgan. He\'s definitely a master at his craft and he\'s so passionate about history. He intrigues students by challenging them through abstract thinking strategies and not completely referencing from the text. He uses tons of visuals to show perspective and is truly relatable.

comments: Mr. Coster is my favorite professor at Morgan. Not only is he engaging with his students, but he is an EXPERT in history. He doesn\'t do boring ppts, but instead creates a presentation with photos, art, and more interesting media that entertains AND educates you (along with her corny but awesome jokes). I will take him again if I can!

comments: Professor Coster is one of the best teachers I\'ve ever had! His passion for history rubs off on his students and he actually wants you to learn the material! His homework is super easy and he makes it clear that you don\'t have to buy the book because he puts it online so you don\'t have to waste money! Amazing teacher and he really cares!!!

comments: Mr. Coster was a very good professor. Albeit, his material is not easy, but the extent in which he teaches makes the material easy. He knows how to get the students to understand the material and you\'ll realize, after a period of time, he loves what he teaches. Words could not express how great of a professor he is.

comments: He is the best professor I ever had. He has so much passion for history, his emotions can be seen in his teaching. His exams are reasonable. he barely assigns homework. he only gave 6 assignments all semester. Prior knowledge is key on finals and midterms. Just participate in class, and listenwrite notes when he lectures. You will not fall asleep.

comments: Mr. Coster is the best history teacher! Took him for history 105106. I learned so much, he makes history interesting hes extremely passionate. VERY easy assignments, very hard to fail this class. i would take him over and over if i could!

tag_professor: Respected (8)  Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Participation matters (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Mr. Coster is the best professor I have had. He has so much passion for history, it radiates through his teaching. This is the ONLY history class I have ever enjoyed. His exams are reasonable. He will give you 3-5 questions on the covered material, you will be asked to pick 1-3 and write a short essay using what you learned. Learned a lot!!!

tag_professor: Respected (8)  Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Participation matters (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: He is the best teacher I have had at The Morgan State University. His notes were clear and understandable, he was always available for help and study tips and he is an all around good guy. I recommend Mr. Coster for anybody who wants to get an "A". However just like life is the "A" won\'t be given you have to earn that thing!
